title: Unidimensional semi-discrete partial optimal transport
summary: This paper studies the semi-discrete formulation of one-dimensional partial optimal transport, where a probability density is partially transported to a finite sum of Dirac masses. It finds applications in risk management, crowd motion modeling, and sliced partial transport algorithms for point cloud registration.
